refnamediv.refpurpose: The CoverageSetupTask prepares a database which can be used to gather code coverage information for unit tests.

refentry.refsect1:
&ref.title.example;
<coverage-setup database="./reports/coverage.db">
<fileset dir="classes"> <include name="**/*.php"/> </fileset> </coverage-setup> <phpunit codecoverage="true"> <batchtest> <fileset dir="src">
<include name="*Test.php"/> </fileset> </batchtest> </phpunit>
